title: Kenya: Kuguru Rolls Out National Nework for Sanitary Plant
text:
Kenya: Borrow for Investment Not Recurrent Needs 
Kuguru has a 20 per cent stake in the Chinese firm and has been importing All White from China since June this year, currently selling10, 000 packets per month. 
Speaking to the Star in Nairobi over the weekend, he said the factory is expected to be operational by 2017. Kenya
